def hex_to_bin_reverse(hex_num):
    binary_num = bin(int(hex_num, 16))[3:]
    reversed_binary_num = binary_num[::-1]
    return reversed_binary_num

def hex_to_bin_reverse(hex_num):
    binary_num = bin(int(hex_num, 16))[1:]
    reversed_binary_num = binary_num[::-1]
    return reversed_binary_num
